describe: San Marino is a small, landlocked country surrounded by Italy. It is known for its historic architecture, medieval walled old town, and narrow cobblestone streets. As one of the world's oldest republics, it boasts a rich history and cultural heritage.

cities.name: üèô San Marino City
cities.geographical_location: Located on the slopes of Monte Titano, in the central part of the country.
cities.climate: San Marino City experiences a Mediterranean climate with warm summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Torta Tre Monti, a layered wafer cake, and Faggioli con le Cotiche, a traditional bean and pork rind soup.
